heading: HR02106
0: RESOLUTION URGING FOR THE RESCISSION OF THE ADMINISTRATIVE ORDER ISSUED BY DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE SECRETARY EMMANUEL PIÑOL ALLOWING THE IMPORTATION OF 17,000 METRIC TONS OF GALUNGGONG (ROUND SCAD), BREAK AWAY FROM IMPORTATION AS BAND-AID SOLUTION FOR FOOD SECURITY, INSTEAD, ADDRESS THE FUNDAMENTAL ISSUES OF THE FISHERIES SECTOR, MAJORLY PROTECTING THE RIGHTS TO LIVELIHOOD OF SMALL FISHERFOLK SECTOR AND PROMOTING GENUINE FISHERIES AND AQUATIC REFORMS
principal-authors: CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on AQUACULTURE AND FISHERIES RESOURCES since 2018-09-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02106
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING FOR THE RESCISSION OF THE ADMINISTRATIVE ORDER ISSUED BY DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE SECRETARY EMMANUEL PIÑOL ALLOWING THE IMPORTATION OF 17,000 METRIC TONS OF GALUNGGONG (ROUND SCAD), BREAK AWAY FROM IMPORTATION AS BAND-AID SOLUTION FOR FOOD SECURITY, INSTEAD, ADDRESS THE FUNDAMENTAL ISSUES OF THE FISHERIES SECTOR, MAJORLY PROTECTING THE RIGHTS TO LIVELIHOOD OF SMALL FISHERFOLK SECTOR AND PROMOTING GENUINE FISHERIES AND AQUATIC REFORMS
